game.name: Plant Budz 98
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Plant Budz 98 is a pet simulator, but also a first-person shooter, a side scrolling shooter, a dating-simulator, an arcade-style endless runner, and much more.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Plant Budz 98 is a pet simulator, but also a first-person shooter, a side scrolling shooter, a dating-simulator, an arcade-style endless runner, and much more.
